name: AttributeTest
description: Unit tests for the Attribute class in the Jsoup library, focusing on attribute handling and validation.

test_cases.name: html
test_cases.description: Tests the html method of the Attribute class to ensure it correctly formats the attribute string.

test_cases.name: testWithSupplementaryCharacterInAttributeKeyAndValue
test_cases.description: Tests the html method with supplementary characters in the attribute key and value.

test_cases.name: validatesKeysNotEmpty
test_cases.description: Tests that the Attribute constructor throws an IllegalArgumentException when the key is empty.

test_cases.name: validatesKeysNotEmptyViaSet
test_cases.description: Tests that the setKey method throws an IllegalArgumentException when the key is empty.

test_cases.name: booleanAttributesAreEmptyStringValues
test_cases.description: Tests that boolean attributes have empty string values and are correctly identified as boolean attributes.

test_cases.name: settersOnOrphanAttribute
test_cases.description: Tests the setKey and setValue methods of the Attribute class.

test_cases.name: hasValue
test_cases.description: Tests the hasDeclaredValue method of the Attribute class to check if an attribute has a declared value.

test_cases.name: canSetValueToNull
test_cases.description: Tests that the setValue method can set the value to null and that the html method handles it correctly.

test_cases.name: booleanAttributesAreNotCaseSensitive
test_cases.description: Tests that the isBooleanAttribute method is case-insensitive and that boolean attributes are correctly parsed in HTML.
